description:
This module aims to equip students with basic macroeconomic literacy. It provides essential concepts and tools to appreciate, analyse and evaluate economic growth, inflation, government monetary and fiscal intervention, trade
liberalization, international flow of capital, immigration and globalization. The module applies these concepts and tools to topical issues of real-world importance to managers and policy-makers.
title: Global Economy
prerequisite: BSP1703 or BSP1707 or EC1101E or EC1301.
